original_text: And his sons went and feasted in their houses, every one his day; and sent and called for their three sisters to eat and to drink with them.
korean_text: 그의 아들들이 자기 생일에 각각 자기의 집에서 잔치를 베풀고 그의 누이 세 명도 청하여 함께 먹고 마시더라

sentences.original_text: And his sons went and feasted in their houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들들이 가서 각각의 집에서 잔치를 베풀었고

sentences.original_text: and sent and called for their three sisters
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람을 보내 자매 셋을 불렀으며

sentences.original_text: to eat and to drink with them
